body:
Hello everyone, some of you might already know that I upload YouTube videos, but I decided to share it with all of you guys. Recently I haven't got much support, so I will need your guys opinion about my videos! It would be great If you could like some of my videos or even subscribe to my YouTube channel! I upload Avicus almost every single day and other videos like Avicube or Crisp PvP every other day. I really hope you guys enjoy my videos!

My Channel
https://youtube.com/channel/UCxhnBafIT_7EZYL8IbGRTTw
EDIT: I now have a new channel: 
https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCQoJVVekIHhEUoJW5Blszpg

PvP Montages
PvP montage episode 1: https://youtu.be/sWsok2ZPhm8

PvP montage episode 2: https://youtu.be/V7mF2MfDERg

Pvp montage episode 3: https://youtu.be/Kbc3KoP9NM8

Pvp montage episode 4: https://youtu.be/JoedaAwzeEo

Pvp montage episode 5: https://youtu.be/eE_5RtwWDlw

Pvp montage episode 6: https://youtu.be/FoquPCfP0OE

Pvp montage episode 7: https://youtu.be/6SJbgzJixG8

Pvp montage episode 
8: https://youtu.be/04iNA6L6nA8

Pvp montage episode 9: https://youtu.be/jMauhzQJ3Qo

Pvp montage episode 10: https://youtu.be/ZR6MwFGf3-k

Pvp montage episode 11: https://youtu.be/gZVmqFot_D8

Pvp montage episode 12: https://youtu.be/9yQJADmlzeo

Pvp montage episode 13: https://youtu.be/bGUTEN-y68k

Pvp montage episode 14: https://youtu.be/j5r4ECMYVz4

Avicube
Avicube episode 1: 
https://youtu.be/HLO1Tgkuy3c

Avicube episode 2: 
https://youtu.be/uKBk2xrinCw

Avicube episode 3: https://youtu.be/5VrOZvw57HA

Avicube episode 4: 
https://youtu.be/6_El88PTbRg

UHC Highlights
UHC highlights episode 1: 
https://youtu.be/28jcAwbYm0g

UHC highlights episode 2: https://youtu.be/TgQs5vkKi2s

Other Info
I will be posting my videos on this thread!
Other Avicus youtubers are in all of my videos description!
Links to all the servers I play on are in the description!

I hope to get some feedback from you guys!

replies.body:
OMG guys! We've reached 12 subs! Thank you so much! :D 
I will be uploading the 10 subscriber special tomorrow or the day after, as soon as I can. But again, I thank all of you for 10 subscribers :D. This is a huge milestone to me because I now know that people enjoy my videos and decide to support me, anyway, get ready for the 10 sub special!

10 SUBSCRIBER SPECIAL!!!
I would like to thank some people for recording with me, here are just some people amazing friends who offered to help:
•Kip09
•DaCrowMan
•Awesomemerp
•Nemo1197
•Pretty much EVERYONE on the AV network :D

I would like to thank greatly for all your support, and my next special will be 20 subs, 50, 80 and 100.

Great thanks
~ Galrandir

Go and check out my 10 SUBSCRIBER SPECIAL HERE:

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=L90QUl-kEIM

This was mainly a test, so I will be making larger montages in the future. This edit took me around 1 and a half hours to make, but it was really fun! So smack that like button for more awesome montages! :)
